title: Mudhal Murai Lyrics Sangamam
stanzas:
Mudhal murai killi paarthen
mudhal murai kannil verthaen
endhan thaayin karbam thaandi
marumurai uyir konden
unnaal irumurai uyir konden(2)

mudhal murai enakku
azhuhida thondrum
yaen......
kanneer undu
sogam illai ..aamaam
mazhai undu megamillai.

salangaigal anindhum
saththangalai maraithaai
penne un ullam thannai
oliththathenna..

vidhai ondru uyir kolla
veppam kaatru eeram vendum
kadhal vandhu uyir kolla
kaalam kooda vaendum.

oru vidhai uyir kondathu
aanaal iru nenjil
vaerkondathu

mozhi ellaam oomai aanaal
kanneer uraiyaadum adhil
kavidhai arangaerum.

Padhaiyin thooram
naan oru baaram
ennai unnellai varai
kondu selvaayaa

udalukkul irukkum
uyir oru sumaiyaa
penne.. unnai naanum
vittu selvaenaa..

thanthai thantha uyir thandthen
thaai thandha udal thanthen
uravugal ellaa serththu
unnidam kanden

Mudhal murai killi paarthen
mudhal murai kannil verthaen
endhan thaayin karbam thaandi
marumurai uyir konden
unnaal irumurai uyir konden

mudhal murai enakku
azhuhida thondrum
yaen......
kanneer undu
sogam illai ..aamaam
mazhai undu megamillai.
